did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: The Speaking of Henry Fountain Ashurst 1952
did.abstract: Typescript thesis concerning Senator Ashurst provides biographical information and studies speeches, their occasions and audiences. Includes four photographs of Ashurst.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: The Speaking of Henry Fountain Ashurst (AZ 123). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of John Renoe, 1962.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Educator; professor of Speech, University of Arizona, 1946-1980.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in narrative sequence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript thesis concerning Senator Ashurst provides biographical information and studies speeches, their occasions and audiences. Includes four photographs of Ashurst. Thesis submitted to the University of Utah.

item.subject: Speeches, addresses, etc., American -- Arizona -- 20th century
